review: This streams from my wi-fi router fast enough to watch Amazon and Netflix movies without any problem at all. I like the way the software organizes the channels and selections within each channel.Be aware that the 'stick' needs external power, so there will be a small cord running from the back of the TV (where the stick is installed) to the closest 120vac outlet.The remote is great, too. Easy to set up. Very pleased.
